description: This notice is issued to cover a requirement amongst the General Stream from product category 6 across the agriculture business units. Pursuant to this purchasing processes, the department is to purchase office furniture to be delivered to Gatineau, Quebec (Hull) over the period of March 4, 2024, to May 4, 2024. The contract is then expected to end on may 4, 2024. The departments security requirements should not be disregarded. ERRORS, INCOMPATIBILITIES
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EN439-240497 LTDLC Phase 1A.2 – Cat 6D Workspaces

The following government tender announcement [referenceNumber-numeroReference: WS4322297308-Doc4326850040] refers to the purchase of office furniture for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

* [amendmentNumber-numeroModification: 3] - Released on [amendmentDate-dateModification: 2023-12-05]
* Tender closing date: [tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture: 2023-12-08T14:00:00]
* Expected contract start date: [expectedContractStartDate-dateDebutContratPrevue: 2023-12-15]

## Contract Details

* Procurement category: [procurementCategory-categorieApprovisionnement: GD]
* CPI classification: [unspsc: *56101700]
* Notice type: [noticeType-avisType-eng: RFP against Supply Arrangement]
* Procurement method: [procurementMethod-methodeApprovisionnement-eng: Competitive - Open bidding]
* Trade agreements: [tradeAgreements-accordsCommerciaux-eng: *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)]


## Requirements

The procurement is for the delivery and installation of office furniture to the National Capital Region (NCR). This project involves security requirements. Delivery is expected between 2024/03/04 and 2024/05/04. The contract start date is expected to be [expectedContractStartDate-dateDebutContratPrevue: 2023-12-15].

## Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Procuring entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* Request for proposal
